Hello {!Lead.Name},
Your modular building quote request for {!Lead.Company}, {!Lead.Address} is very important to our team at BOXX Modular. Unfortunately, I have not yet had the pleasure of connecting with you over the phone; and that likely is because you are very busy.
- Is there a particular time of day that would work best for me to contact you? - Is {!Lead.Phone} the best phone number for me to reach you?

We rent furniture, steps, and decks so you can get up-and-running quickly when you move into your building. You may want to browse some of the options available . We are happy to provide custom quantities and options when needed. https://www.boxxmodular.ca/add-ons/
Thank you for your interest in BOXX Modular, I look forward to speaking with you soon!
We are here to help!
Andrea Regimbal Marketing Coordinator BOXX Modular Phone: 437-360-7126 https://www.boxxmodular.ca/
